metadata.title: CVE-2017-17866 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: pdf/pdf-write.c in Artifex MuPDF before 1.12.0 mishandles certain lengthchanges when a repair operation occurs during a clean operation, whichallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer overflow andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedPDF document.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
